title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1243.11 - Materials handling equipment, permit to use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1243.11 - Materials handling equipment, permit to use

State Regulations

No persons shall keep or store in or upon any public
wharf, public mooring facility, public cargo facility or public storage area or
facility at any Port Authority marine terminal, any equipment used or to be
used by him in connection with the loading or unloading of waterborne freight
to or from vehicles (other than railroad cars) except such carriers of freight
by water, water front terminal operators and duly licensed stevedores, as may
be authorized so to do by the Port Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1243.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
